Flicker looses control and grabs her, giving her a
gentle huge, and a quick peck on the cheek, then
releases her.

Flicker:  I didn't know you long, but if you like I
can tell you a little bit about your past.

--- cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote:
> Phoenix sees that she's hurt him, but isn't sure
> what to do.  "I'm 
> sorry," she says.  "It really bothers me, knowing
> that I care about 
> you but not why.  The Rogues did this," she
> indicates her altered 
> state, with the weapons and the new beast form, "to
> me.  I think they 
> deleted my memories, too."  A tear rolls down her
> cheek.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > Flickers mouth dropped open and he began to sob
> > alittle.
> > 
> > Flicker:  Yo-you d-don't even remember.  I wa-was
> > trying to protect you, but I was nearly killed by
> the
> > Ro-Rouges.  You surrendered to them to save me. 
> You
> > don't even remember?
> > 
> > He wants to pull her close, but doesn't want to
> scare
> > her, so he just stands there looking at her and
> > sobbing.
> 
>
